headline.main: FOREIGN SPY GETS A YEAR IN PRISON; German-Born American Admits He Sent Reports Abroad on British Ships Here EXTENT OF GUILT A SECRET Prosecutor Reveals Only Scanty Facts Against Ex-Cook on Liner Manhattan

lead_paragraph: The secrecy surrounding the work of some 200 Federal agents who are continually investigating the espionage activities of foreign powers here was relaxed slightly yesterday with the filing of criminal charges against a young naturalized American of German birth.
abstract: P Fehse, German-born citizen, sentenced for sending repts abroad on Brit ships in N Y C port
